channel.title: Featured on Navendu Pottekkat
channel.description: Recent content in Featured on Navendu Pottekkat

item.title: How I Ask Questions as a Software Engineer
item.description: I ask a lot of questions to my peers and to strangers on public forums in the internet. This year, I have been trying to improve this process to ask better questions. Here is how I do it.

item.title: Why Developers Should Blog
item.description: I have been blogging ever since I started out as a software engineer. Here is why you should do it too.

item.title: Key Takeaways from Morgan Housel's "The Psychology of Money"
item.description: Key takeaways from Morgan Housel’s international bestseller “The Psychology of Money”—brief and to the point.

item.title: Contributing to Documentation in Open-Source
item.description: Contributing to documentation is really impactful for an open-source project. It can also be a stepping stone to make code contributions. Learn how.

item.title: How to Make Non-Code Contributions to Open-Source Projects
item.description: Open-Source is not just about code. See how you can make non-code contributions to open-source.
